text: 21:32 Luk 3:12; 7:29-30Guizbangɨra, Jon otogha arazir aghuimɨn tuavim ian aka, ezɨ ia nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an akamɨn ikian aghua. Ezɨ dagɨaba isir gumaziba ko amizir arazir kurabagh amiba, me nɨghnɨzir gavgaviba an iti. Ia bizir kamɨn ganigha uan nɨghnɨzibagh irazir puvatɨ, egha nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Jonɨn akamɨn itir puvatɨ.”
